content.text: Any circumstance that is pertinent to workload management. In Teradata ASM, there are three types of events: planned, unplanned, and user-defined events, all of which can cause a reallocation of system resources. In Teradata EM, alert events signal that a metric threshold has been crossed. Health events are used to do component heartbeats, signal process start and stops, as well as perform data synchronization checks for data resources.Â
